DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to prove a reduction of postoperative wound infections after direct preoperative use of a microbial sealant in the form of Integuseal for vascular procedures on lower extremities.
DOC.brief_title: Trial Using Integuseal as Microbial Sealant for Arterial Bypass Surgery on Lower Extremities
DOC.criteria: planned supragenual of infragenual peripheral arterial bypass procedures with autologue or prosthetic graft secondary procedures and suprainguinal procedures
